page.title: 12HOUSES OF LIPHOOK
page.content: Most of the houses in Liphook are Post War.Many of the ones that are pre-war have been rebuilt in places and modernized.Older houses are being pulled down to make way for newer and stronger houses or in many cases, flats and office blocks.Liphook is expanding as more and more houses and offices are being built and has changed dramatically since world war II. At the Centre of Liphook some of the houses are above the shops that are there.The ones above the shops were built just after the war. There are a few modern council estates in the centre of the town as well as older houses. There are many hotels in Liphook. There are also many pubs. On the older houses the doors and windows are wooden and old fashioned.
